attributes.Name: The Daten
attributes.eventDescription: You're invited to: Babies & Tots Kings Coronation Party at  The Daten 📍  We're taking things to the next level with this event - it's going to be bigger and better than ever before! We've got more space to play, more exciting activities to enjoy, and more laughter to share to celebrate🥳🤩🇬🇧  Don't miss out on the fun! Join us with your little one on Wednesday 3rd May for an unforgettable party. This is an event you won't want to miss, so make sure to mark your calendars and get ready to have a blast! 🔥

attributes.Name: Patricroft
attributes.eventDescription: Come & join us for our Fun For All Party, open to all ages at @patricroftconsclub! The disco will be held on Friday 5th May, and we'll be celebrating for 3 hours from 6:30pm🥳  Feel free to come & go as you please throughout the night, you and your children don't want to miss out on the dancing, magic & giggles 🤩 There might even be a few prizes to be won too👀  Tickets are £8.50 per child and if you buy 3 tickets, you get 1 free, so make sure to bring all your friends!

attributes.Name: Tilwalds
attributes.eventDescription: Looking for some Friday Fun for you and the kids?⭐  Join us to party & play bingo at Tilwards on Friday the 12th of May and you won't be disappointed🔥💗  In true Louby Lou and Ibiza style, we'll be giving away some fun prizes, dancing, and spreading laughter all around🙌

attributes.Name: Ewe Bar
attributes.eventDescription: School Holiday Fun at Ewe Restaurant🥳  📅Friday 2nd June 🕛12pm - 1:30pm 👫ALL AGES WELCOME!  ⚡What to expect: A party of a lifetime with Music🎶Saxophone🎷Games🥳Magic🪄Treats🍭& MORE...

attributes.Name: The Delph
attributes.eventDescription: IT'S TIME FOR TOTS AT THE DELPH💛 Join us for a morning filled with enjoyable activities, allowing your little one to engage, dance and build confidence whilst you have  an opportunity to connect with other parents/guardians. 🥳 Let's make some memories 😊
